mdRecord.dcterms:title: Who will care for Micky now?: A parody on "Who will care for Mother now?" / by Eugene T. Johnston
Arrah! Molly darlin' I am drafted
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Eugene T.
Magnus, Charles.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published by Chas. Magnus, 12 Frankfort St. N.Y.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Civil War song sheet (without the music)
First line: "Arrah! Molly darlin' I am drafted."
Three verses and chorus; blue ink on ruled paper; without border; headpiece Magnus 227, col.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: E647 .S63 no. 11: Boxed together with other Civil War song sheets.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1628.3 .C6 1861 no.24: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Twenty-fourth of 25 song sheets which were mounted in an unidentified scrapbook. Rehoused, 2009.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: War songs--United States--Texts.
United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Songs and music--Texts.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: New York (City), New York (State), United States
